name: Breakeroo
description:
A Breakout, brick breaker clone written in Monogame for Windows 10.

Single player game, with keyboard and Gamepad (XBOX 360 Controller) controls available.

Player moves the paddle at the bottom of the screen up down left or right to rebound the ball or balls, attempting to hit all the bricks with the ball(s) to complete the level.

Player can choose start level from 1 to 8.

There are 4 x bonuses that can be obtained by hitting the Cross Sphere; the bonuses range from an extra life to catch ball to Multiball bonus - with multiple bonues available.

The game inlcudes 10 original songs created for the game(hence the large download size), new background screens per level and all sound effects.

All you need to do is download and unzip the zip file and double click "Breakeroo" executable to run the game; no installation process required.

.NET Framework must be installed on your Windows version.
